channel.title: Posts on Will's Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Will's Portfolio

item.title: First post
item.description:
Howdy! There’s nothing too interesting on this page, feel free to look around!

Color Test!

item.title: A4988 Stepper Motor Controller
item.description:
Goal: Learn about higher-powered digital electronics, and PCB design for integrated boards. This PCB was designed with my Atmega32U4 project in mind.

STATUS: I hit a wall :/

item.title: ITX Computer Build
item.description:
Custom building my own ITX desktop computer

STATUS: Complete!

item.title: Photography
item.description: Gallery of some cool/interesting photos I have taken

item.title: LF3DP
item.description:
Adapting Dr. D Flo’s Large Format 3D Printer (LF3DP) build for the RPS

STATUS: Work in Progress

item.title: Li-ion Battery Charger
item.description:
Goal: Build my own 18650 Lithium-ion interface for later projects. Functionalities should include battery regulation, standard safety features, and a boost converter able to provide 5/12V. Learn about simple battery management systems.

STATUS: Back-Burner

item.title: Alarm_clock
item.description:
Goal: to learn about microcontroller integration & usage in electronics projects.

To use an Arduino nano / ESP32 with a RTC module to create a functional alarm clock.

Status: Abandoned :(

(I plan on coming back to this later)

item.title: Plasma Cutter
item.description:
Resurrecting an abandoned Torchmate CNC Plasma Cutter for TAMU MEEN Dept.

Goal: Learn about, fix, and document the process of using a CNC plasma cutter for students & staff to use

STATUS: Build Complete! Still working on improvements

item.title: Atmega32U4
item.description:
Goal: To create my own microcontroller devboard based on the Atmega32U4

To learn about embedded systems, designing PCB for digital circuitry, and programming/debugging the board.

STATUS: Work In Progress
